bio: Daenlyn, a Bosmer man, was recently taken a prisoner by three Thalmor Justiciars, for singing the song "Age of Oppression" a bit too loudly while performing in a tavern. Luckily, the player saved Daenlyn by killing the justiciars while they were escorting him on the road as their prisoner. Daenlyn is a bard who possesses a quick mind and a strong sardonic wit. He has a background in art and art history due to his extensive bard training.
name: Daenlyn Oakhollow
